title: Midwest utility-scale battery yard (150MW)
summary: Regional co-op released preliminary scope for a 150MW battery yard with four medium voltage interconnects, relays, and prefabricated inverter skids.

title: Hyperscale data hall fit-out (Tier IV)
summary: Owner issued electrical RFP for dual-fed 40MW build-out with Starline bus, containment lighting, and redundant battery strings.

title: Kansas solar campus expansion planned
summary: Developer hinted at a 120MW addition with DC collection upgrades, battery containers, and new grid interconnection study.
